item.description:
Join us for some fun from 3:00 - 4:30 at Off The Leash! We'll run and play in the new back area and the pools will be out, weather permitting! If raining, we'll be in the main playroom.

The health and safety of our furry friends is our top priority. Please be sure that your doggie(s) are current on their vaccinations including bordatella, DHLPP and rabies.

All dogs must be spayed or neutered if over 7 months old.

group.name: The North Attleboro Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: July Small Doggie Meetup
